title: Не работает в сетях
content: Hello.  I bought Google Pixel 3 XL on ebay, but it doesn’t work on gsm networks.  It only works in sprint or verizon.  I understand that it is locked under the operator.  How can I unlock it so that it works in Ukraine networks ???  Waiting for help
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
